statement.p: Consider the note G4 which has frequency 391.995 Hz.
What is the period for G4?
What is the wavelength for G4?
Recall that the speed of sound is 1116 feet per second.

solution.p: Period is the inverse of frequency, so \displaystyle\frac{{1}}{{391.995}}\approx{0.0025510529471039}\approx{0.00255105}.
Wavelength is a unit conversion: \displaystyle\frac{{{1116}\ \text{ ft}}}{{\text{second}}}\cdot\frac{{{1}\ \text{ second}}}{{{391.995}\ \text{ cycles}}}\approx{2.846975088968}\approx{2.847}.
